6.1.19  9:24 pm   should I do DMT?

     i'm not sure

6.1.19  9:13 pm   Do you know any fancy terms for 'Quit'?

     stop

      Not because I want to, just because I want to know in case of emergency, or should I keep going even if it is an emergency?

     you could try to stop the emergency

6.1.19  8:33 pm   is your next video gonna feature mostly you (like just did a bad thing, when i get older, etc)

     no

      or handmade crazy graphics

     yes

      (like slow down, long long long journey, etc)

     not quite

      or a good healthy mix of both like la de da?

6.1.19  8:27 pm   bill you have no idea how much you inspire/entertain/educate me. how much do i owe you?

     100 dollars

6.1.19  7:59 pm   When will you post Instagram hints 

     any moment now

6.1.19  7:57 pm   Why is it so hard to explain things to people? It's like, I know a lot about this certain thing but I have no idea how to explain it. It's really frustrating, and I don't really know how to fix that problem :( is there any type of solution to that?

     in this situation, for example, i would recommend that you tell me the thing you would like to explain

6.1.19  6:54 pm   I love listening to jazz, and I always get excited to hear spicy chord progressions. I play many instruments, but I don't know how to play jazz. How should I start learning jazz theory?

     first, find some recordings of what you consider jazz. then start figuring out what they played, one note at a time. soon you will find yourself able to learn more than 1 note at a time, as you grow accustomed to what they are doing

6.1.19  6:40 pm   Do you have any advice on what to do, when a project you've started is too overwhelming that you don't know what to do next?

     make it more overwhelming

6.1.19  5:52 pm   how you feeling about the diamond industry

     cautious yet confident

6.1.19  5:14 pm   Why the thing

     due to reasons and causation

6.1.19  5:01 pm   i hope u know that your improv stuff is better than stuff that i would spend10 years on

     that's nice of you

6.1.19  4:06 pm   have you ever been a therapist

     not for hire

6.1.19  2:42 pm   Have you found the sense of life, if so, will you let me know when you find it?

     i have found some but there is always more

6.1.19  1:58 pm   what are you working on at the moment?

     a music video which may look slightly different than the ones i've done before

6.1.19  1:16 pm   Biggest fear?

     large groups of small fears

     no

      if so i need one

6.1.19  12:16 pm   will you start making wednesday videos?

     more likely thursday

     i don't know

6.1.19  10:37 am   If you ever perform live would you add covers to the set?

     yes

      If so, what songs would you want to cover live?

     all of them

6.1.19  7:30 am   so why did you elect to name hotewig "hotewig" instead of "what happened"

     i never named it 'hotewig', i named it "history of the entire world, i guess"

6.1.19  6:00 am   What do the project files of your songs usually look like?

      dirt

      How many tracks do you usually have?

     maybe 200

6.1.19  4:51 am   bill why cant i find we got to know whats going on in the songs sections of the website

     take out the 'we'? the title is just "got to know whats going on". the date is about 6.?.17

6.1.19  3:10 am   i honestly like wfaoie styled videos, do you plan on making others?

     yes

6.1.19  2:41 am   do you make music

     yes

6.1.19  12:28 am   what if the all the questions are being asked by a single person

     they probably wouldn't have asked this one so many times





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

5.31.19  11:56 pm   what does "im feeling randy" really mean. Why is that so deep

     it means you are ready to see randomized questions, and it also resembles the "i'm feeling lucky" button from google, and it also frames "randy" as a feeling, which in some cultures means aroused, sexually

5.31.19  11:55 pm   what do you worry about

     a thing

5.31.19  11:39 pm   How do you come up with the little instrumental solos in the background of your songs?

     i'm not sure

5.31.19  10:28 pm   do you have more fun messing with time signatures and all this weird complicated music stuff (but mostly signatures) or cool nice video tricks

     how about cool nice music and video

5.31.19  8:56 pm   what's your opinion on video game music, in general

     the music makes the game stronger, and the game in turn makes the music stronger. it's a phenomenon that causes players to fall in love rapidly with both the game and the music

5.31.19  8:55 pm   If earth's moon had its own moon, what would you name it

     the little moon

5.31.19  8:55 pm   What color is your couch?

     rainbow

5.31.19  8:08 pm   what kind of synths or patches do you use in your music?

     you'll have to listen and see

     you could learn it from crabs. in all fairness that would be crab math, but math nonetheless

     i'm not sure

     toddlers

     should be the default setting

     What The Hell Am I Doing

5.31.19  2:19 pm   i feel like if you collaborated with Jon Bois, the two of you would rise way beyond everything else -- consistently. his sensibilities are so very similar to yours, even though you both bring tons of unique ideas to the table. your content feels like his content's brother. i can't stress this enough -- please find a way to work with Jon Bois on SOMETHING

     i don't get out much, but if you are serious about that you should also try to send him the same message

5.31.19  1:33 pm   how would you feel about software (installed on an electronic keyboard) that, given the set of keys being pressed, calculated small adjustments to the frequencies of each note that would result in a "justly-tuned" chord? 

     not interested, besides, that would result in paradoxes anyway

5.31.19  1:05 pm   What do non-Muslims imagine fasting is like?

     i don't know but i understand it to be somewhat epic and maybe even psychedelic, after a bit of hunger to start things off

5.31.19  12:12 pm   Hint for the song after the next one?

     unknown

     


Btw I love your music Bill please don't stop making it. <3


     that's nice of you

5.31.19  12:07 pm   why do you bother to answer mediocre questions u get

     why do you bother to ask them

5.31.19  12:01 pm   5.30.19  3:11 pm why don't you upload the song?

     it makes for a much stronger release for both the video and the song if they are released together

     never

5.31.19  11:45 am   I think I'm suffering from the old world blues. Do you have any advice about this?

     go to the new world!

     no

      If I recall correctly you did this with Just did a bad thing

     yes, that was a terrible terrible mistake which i have vowed will never happen again

5.31.19  11:41 am   If you had to eat one particular food everyday, what would it be?                                                 

     rice

     




Also I wanted to say that I love your videos and keep up with your own pace.
                                                          

     that's nice of you
